name: RollTHeDice (Hor Yang Kai)
description:
This game is about a game where u have to roll a dice to select your bonus and effect.Not only this game has tons of amazing and unpredictable mechanic that cause u go mad(lol).Do keep in mind this game may have issue with mouse icon disappears after playing the game(press sleep mode in power column and boot up to solve).Hope u like it and give a review  

SUBMISSION To GMTK Game Jam 2022

CONTROL:W for forward, A for left, D for right, S for backwards, hover mouse to rotate
